title: Enchanted Moondial
summaries: The Enchanted Moondial is a furniture item that can be placed. Pressing ⚷ Open / Activate on it will advance time to dusk (7:30 PM) on the current or following day. It has a 7-day cooldown period, so once used, it will not be usable again until 7 in-game days (2 hours and 48 minutes in real time) have passed normally. The Enchanted Moondial is obtained by throwing an Enchanted Sundial into Shimmer.

The Enchanted Moondial does not turn the time to dusk immediately. It instead "fast-forwards" time, causing it to pass 60 times faster than usual (1 hour of in-game time, which would usually take 1 minute of real-life time, takes only 1 second while the Enchanted Moondial is active). Sleeping in a <linked>Bed</linked> will not make time pass faster while the Enchanted Moondial is active. The Enchanted Moondial glows to indicate when it is ready to be used.

statistics.Tooltip: Allows time to fast forward to dusk one day per week
